marklogic.body:
I have longed to try this stuff, but never got a chance. I sadly had to walk away from it before I left Paris because I only had hand luggage and my liquid bag was maxed out. :( Have also feared getting it Off online saler incase it isnt genuine.
Surprisingly my favourite beauty product of the moment has been Superdrugs own brand Vitamin E Intense Moisture Cream. I suffer from quite Dry skin and this has been a real treat, really helps my dry patches and at Â£2.99 is a bargin !
